conversations.body_text:
What about answer me? Il giorno 28 nov 2025, alle ore 13:14, service@simsonn.com ha scritto: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Andrea Spatti We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created. A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours). To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/6945?follow=email Thank you for your patience. View ticket If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address bar: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/6945?follow=email Regards, simsonn Support Team 





 
 




6945:4206036

Hi Andrea Spatti,    I'm terribly sorry for the delayed response. As our German warehouse is currently out of stock, we can only arrange for your order to be dispatched from China as soon as possible. There will be no customs duties incurred, please rest assured.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047079989464
